title: Tahini
meta: Makes ½ cup. Keeps in fridge for 5 months
directions: In a food processor pulse seasame seeds a few times.
Add a pinch of salt and 1 TBSP olive oil slowly while processing for about 20 seconds.
Cut garlic into small pieces and add to processor with vingegar, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Process for 30 seconds while slowly adding 3 TBSP olive oil.
